rule: The response must strictly follow the format ["model_name"] without any deviations or extra elements.
input: Our analysis covers several case studies.
validityText:
The input is a non-empty English string; however, it is too brief and does not contain the necessary elements typically found in the abstract of a machine learning paper. An abstract usually provides a summary of the research objectives, methods, results, and conclusions, which are not sufficiently addressed in the given input.
